name: @calcom/viasocket
description:
viaSocket is a no-code, AI-powered workflow automation platform that helps users connect their favorite tools and automate repetitive tasks. When integrated with Cal.id, viaSocket allows users to:Trigger workflows based on new or updated bookings in Cal.id.Automatically send booking confirmations, reminders, or follow-ups via email, SMS, or messaging apps. Sync scheduling data with tools like Google Sheets, Notion, or CRMs for centralized tracking. Create tasks or events in other platforms based on Cal.id activity, streamlining post-booking actions.This integration empowers users to build seamless, personalized scheduling workflows without writing a single line of code
Demo : https://app.supademo.com/demo/cm9tl2l400o4h11m7di9ck3jx/edit#ai
